_sText: The second coming of breakingpoint. In this version, Many bugs are fixed and amazing new things are added. __New Jail!__ → Thinner walls, making for a larger jail. → Fixed the death on landing too fast glitch → Added Working doors, which can either be opened from the outside or inside (top of crates) → Encourages teamwork by needing 1 person to crouch down to get on top of crates. → A Button is hidden in the map which allows players to kill everyone in jail! __New Textures__ → Replaced texture glass/unbreakable with glass/glasswindow07c bringing more colour to the map __Other Updates__ → 3 New guns are avaliable in the map, 12 TMP's, 2 M249's and 14 p226 Pistol's. → A Secret Teleport which takes you inside the surf ramp. → Changed the hidden middle area behind the spawns to give 7 pistol's each. → Added a xm1014 shotgun above the MOLE. And generally made it better all around. Enjoy, leave a comment and rate!
